data.message: My friend Lindsey Keune has passed away today. She asked me to let you know to shut down her Facebook account. So, please close it for her upon her request.

replies.message: Hi, Michael. We're so sorry for your loss. If someone has passed away, it's our policy to memorialize their account. You can learn more about memorialized accounts here: on.fb.me/1uKL9Jo. Please let us know if you have any other questions or if there's anything else we can help you with. -Rhea

Facebook Hello facebook i have question How can i know someone's comment before he edited?Means his comment before he edited(the person who comment agree on this he also want to know his first comment please answer this it's urgent ) :)... i can also give you the link :) i'm hoping an answer (y)
Just click on the word edit on the post!
There is profanity on Lindsey Keune's page and other people are posting inapporiate things on it so PLEASE close out Lindsey's account when you have a chance.
